titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd to the Society for Reformation of Manners in Nottingham Novemb. 24. 1698. By John Barret Minister of the Gospel. Published at the desire of the said Society.
titleStmt.author: Barret, John, 1631-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho. Snowden, and sold by John Richards, bookseller in Nottingham,

notesStmt.note: "Novemb. 24. 1698." is in square brackets on the title page.
Reproduction of original in the Dr. Williams' Library, London, England.
